title: How to disable propagate touch event in both SKGLView and SKCanvasView on iOS (v.1.60.0)
body:
I create SKGLView/SKCanvasView control and put it in the child page of  CarouselPage. Then enable Touch events and handler event by set args.Handled = true, but the event still propagates to carousel cause swipe event.

How to configure SKGLView/SKCanvasView disable propagate the event to parent?  due args.Handled = true is not work for iOS.
